name: Trial By Error
description:
4 levels of agonizing pain to find the right way.

This is the 2nd game I have made for the Brackeys 2022_1 Game Jam. I look forward to any feedback you guys have for me!

Instructions to Play:

  1. Download the .zip file.
  2. Right-click to extract all.
  3. Double-click the .exe file.
  4. PLAY!

Bugs:

When the player's movement is frozen when a level is loaded, hit ESC then Play when the pause menu opens up.

Sometime the game may take longer to open.
